ingredients.item: 6 biscuits from 200g pack Bisconova Savoiardi Lady Fingers
12 tbsp Merchant Gourmet Caramel Dulce de Leche
142ml pot double cream, whipped to soft peaks

instructions.step: Make chocolate shavings by running a Y-shaped peeler down the block of chocolate. Chill until needed.  Divide the biscuits between the glasses and pour over enough Kahlúa or Tia Maria to drench them. Now drop 1 tablespoon of the caramel sauce into each glass and top with whipped cream. Decorate with the chilled chocolate shavings and serve immediately.
